diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $DC$ is $6$ units.
The length of the line $EC$ is $12-x$ units.
The length of the line $CA$ is $x+7$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is $4$ units.
Point $C$ lies on the line connecting $D$ and $B$.
Point $C$ also lies on the line connecting $E$ and $A$.
line_instances: There are lines $DE$, $DC$, and $EC$, forming triangle $DEC$.
The lines $BD$ and $EC$ intersect at point $C$.
